metadata.title: CVE-2024-25939 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Mirrored regions with different values in 3rd Generation Intel(R) Xeon(R)Scalable Processors may allow a privileged user to potentially enabledenial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'trusty doesn't support early microcode loading at runtime').
